messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.body: oh wait you lied to us

messages.body: we were just joking with you

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Fluffy Alert

Unidentified furry objects detected coming aboard Egg Relay Gamma. Beware of Adorable-ness.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to your stupidity we are sending deathsquad

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we bsaed a immoveable rod to the front of bridge the joke is that it is immovable

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Aft Maintenance.
